page.title: 20EMPLOYMENT.
page.content:
Employment is particularly high in this area many men and women finding employment at the nearby British Aerospace complex at Warton, the Open Prison and at British Nuclear Fuels plant at Salwick. In addition many people are successful in obtaining seasonal work in the nearby holiday resorts.
_______________________________________ _
The following children were responsible for this project: Josephine Isles,* Richard Brimley, Andrew Clegg, Michael Lynch,Andrew Nelson,* Neil Wallace. * denotes Photographer in addition to the text.
